tasks.title: Epic 1 - Enhanced Booking Foundation
tasks.description: Establish the core booking experience that positions Wesley's Ambacht as a professional, accessible catering service. This epic delivers the fundamental infrastructure for improved conversion rates through streamlined booking access and enhanced date/time selection capabilities.

subtasks.title: Floating Booking Widget Implementation
subtasks.description: Create a floating 'Check Your Date' button that appears in bottom-right corner on all pages, with responsive design and accessibility features

subtasks.title: Enhanced DateChecker Modal
subtasks.description: Develop modal with calendar component, time slot selection (10:00-20:00), guest count input, and real-time availability checking

subtasks.title: Preliminary Quote Calculator
subtasks.description: Build pricing calculator with service type selection and per-person pricing display (€12.50-€27.50 range)

subtasks.title: Booking Database Schema Enhancement
subtasks.description: Create enhanced Supabase schema with bookings, availability_slots, and quotes tables including real-time subscriptions

tasks.title: Epic 2 - Transparent Pricing & Services
tasks.description: Transform service presentation to build customer confidence through transparent pricing and professional service descriptions. This epic establishes Wesley's Ambacht as a premium service provider with clear value propositions.

subtasks.title: Service Pricing Cards Enhancement
subtasks.description: Create pricing cards with transparent per-person costs for Corporate (€12.50), Social (€27.50), Wedding (€22.50), and Custom services

subtasks.title: Tiered Service Options
subtasks.description: Implement 3-tier system (Essential, Premium, Luxury) for each service category with interactive pricing updates

subtasks.title: Interactive Menu System
subtasks.description: Build menu system with dietary filters, PDF generation, and visual presentation with professional food photography

subtasks.title: Seasonal Specials Section
subtasks.description: Create dynamic seasonal specials showcase with current offerings, special pricing, and admin content management

tasks.title: Epic 3 - Professional Trust Signals
tasks.description: Establish Wesley's Ambacht as a credible, professional catering service through awards, testimonials, and supplier partnerships. This epic builds the confidence and trust necessary for premium market positioning.

subtasks.title: Awards and Certifications Section
subtasks.description: Display professional certifications, quality assurance badges, industry memberships, and achievement statistics

subtasks.title: Enhanced Testimonials Carousel
subtasks.description: Build auto-rotating testimonials carousel with client details, ratings, filtering, and social proof statistics

subtasks.title: Local Supplier Partnership Showcase
subtasks.description: Create supplier partnership showcase featuring heritage stories for cheese, bakery, fish, and organic suppliers

subtasks.title: Professional Contact Enhancement
subtasks.description: Enhance contact options with memorable phone display, business hours, emergency contact, and multi-method presentation

tasks.title: Epic 4 - Communication & Integration
tasks.description: Enable professional communication capabilities and multi-language support to serve diverse clientele and provide immediate customer assistance. This epic completes the professional platform transformation.

subtasks.title: WhatsApp Business Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate WhatsApp Business API with floating chat button, automated welcome messages, and chat analytics

subtasks.title: Multi-Language Support System
subtasks.description: Implement Dutch/English language toggle with formal tone, session persistence, and SEO optimization

subtasks.title: Enhanced Analytics and Conversion Tracking
subtasks.description: Set up Google Analytics 4, conversion funnel tracking, A/B testing capability, and performance monitoring

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization and PWA Features
subtasks.description: Implement PWA manifest, service worker, image optimization, lazy loading, and Lighthouse score optimization

metadata.description: Transform Wesley's Ambacht into a premium catering platform with Sopranos-inspired features
